text: The star fort located at Maklang, Imphal West, Manipur, India. It is hypothesized that, it is constructed taking in to account, the holy drawing of one of the supreme God of Meitei religion, Ibudhou Pakhangba. The drawing itself is known as, "Ibudhou Pakhangba gi Paphal". The Bihu Loukon () is an ancient star shaped mud fort located in the Maklang region of Imphal West district in the Indian state of Manipur.http://www.starforts.com/bihuloukon.html ==References== Category:History of Manipur Category:Forts in India Category:Buildings and structures in Manipur Category:Archaeological sites in India
title: Bihu Loukon
